review_title: You really have to want to be in the health care field if you want to work here.
job_title: Nurse Technician in Saint Joseph, MI
pros: The wages are in line with the National average, however as with most hospitals,  the nursing staff is overworked.  The burnout rate for nurses is about 2 years on average.
cons: The insurance is terrible,  it's an insult to the health care workers.  Being a hospital employee  should grant you quality insurance at an affordable price.   You are usually stuck with a 30 or 40 dollar copay, which is ridiculous when you consider we are over worked. I feel the hospital should reward it's employees for the hard work they put into their job. Having poor insurance is a slap in the face, it just reinforces the fact that we don't matter.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Saint Joseph, MI
pros: Great day shift team, fun to work with, management is there when needed and understanding
cons: As a new nurse, night shift was rough. The nurses were totally different and became annoyed when you asked for help. They would give new nurses the heaviest load and then sometimes even refuse to help. The experienced nurses would say things like.. “oh, you need  experience with IVs, catheters, etc” and tell you to go do it for their patient while you were trying to care for your own patients.

job_title: Physician, Hospitalist in Saint Joseph, MI
pros: Nice small town to live in, turbulent restructuring of closing an LTACH and starting a hospitalist program led to many physicians being let go!
cons: Non-profit company acts like a for-profit co, only large employer in town, leadership has a "do it or else lose your job, my way or the highway attitude" good for go-with-the-flow employees but better ask how high you need to jump to keep your job (unpaid overtime, asking to do extra shifts last minute, cancelling your overtime shifts last minute if staffing needs change, etc, etc)

job_title: Skills Trainer in Saint Joseph, MI
pros: Lakeland Hospital is a fantastic place to work. It is amazing how many people feel fortunate to have been employed here and what a name they have made for themselves in the community.
cons: Lakeland is undergoing a huge  addition and it indeed has interfered with our parking situation. Most of that is expected to be resolved in the next month with an addition opening to the parking garage.
